description: Bhutan has launched a crypto payment system to let users make crypto payments using Binance Pay. The aim is to incentivise tourists with cheaper alternatives to dodge currency exchange rates and limitations in the acceptability of international cards.
title: Bhutan Partners With Binance to Launch Crypto Payment System for Tourists

description: Honor has formally announced the launch date of Honor 400 series. The Chinese smartphone brand, through its social media handle, confirmed the arrival of its Honor 300 series successors. The teasers reveal the design and specifications of the Honor 400 lineup. They are confirmed to come with a 200-megapixel rear camera.
title: Honor 400, Honor 400 Pro Global Launch Date Revealed; Confirmed to Feature 200-Megapixel Camera

description: Nintendo on Thursday said it expects to sell 15 million Switch 2 units. The gaming device is the successor to the Switch, which has sold more than 150 million units since its 2017 launch and transformed Nintendo's fortunes after the Wii U flopped.
title: Nintendo Expects Switch 2 to Sell 15 Million Units, Profit Rising 13 Percent This Year

description: OnePlus 13s is confirmed to launch in India soon. While the company has yet to announce the launch date, it has continued to tease key features of the handset over the past few weeks. The smartphone will come with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a compact 6.32-inch display. Now, OnePlus has revealed the "Plus Key" feature.
title: OnePlus 13s With Customisable 'Plus Key' Teased Ahead of Launch in India

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 ends tonight and customers have until midnight on Thursday to take advantage of the best discounts during Amazon's mid-year sale. The sale includes offers on smartphones, laptops, tablets, and other electronics. In addition to existing price cuts and discounts, an instant 10 percent discount is available for purchases made with eligible bank cards.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 Ends Tonight: Top Deals You Shouldn’t Miss

description: Bhool Chuk Maaf is a heart-touching Hindi drama set to stream on Amazon Prime Video starting May 16, 2025. Starring Rajkumar Rao and Vamika Gabbi, the film focuses on human flaws, forgiveness, and emotional healing.
title: Bhool Chuk Maaf OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Rajkumar Rao Starrer Film Online?

description: Ethereum's Pectra upgrade is live, which means that network validators can now stake 2,048 ETH tokens. This is a notable rise from the previous limit of 32 ETH tokens. This allows them to earn higher staking rewards and improve the overall experience of contributing to the network.
title: Ethereum Pectra Upgrade Goes Live, Maximum Stake Limit Expanded to 2,048 ETH

description: Figma, the website and app design platform, launched multiple new artificial intelligence (AI) tools on Wednesday. The San Francisco-based company introduced the new tools at its annual Figma Config 2025 event, expanding its product offerings. The new AI tools include Figma Site, Figma Make, Figma Buzz, and Figma Draw. Site is aimed at letting users create fully functional and interactive websites.
title: Figma Launches New AI-Powered Tools for Website Building and Prototype Creation

description: Grand Theft Auto 6’s second trailer has smashed viewing records across social media platforms. Developer Rockstar Games has reportedly claimed that the GTA 6 trailer 2 is the biggest video launch of all time, pulling ahead of trailer launches for popular films like Deadpool & Wolverine.
title: GTA 6 New Trailer 'Biggest Video Launch of All Time' With 475 Million Views, Says Rockstar

description: Rockstar Games released the second trailer for Grand Theft Auto 6 Tuesday without any prior announcement, sending fans into a frenzy. The studio has now reiterated that the trailer footage was captured “entirely in-game" on a PS5 and included some gameplay along with cinematics.
title: GTA 6 Trailer 2 Footage Captured on PS5, Includes 'Equal Parts' Gameplay and Cutscenes, Says Rockstar Games

description: Huawei on Thursday announced HarmonyOS 5, its first-ever self-developed operating system (OS) for PCs at the HarmonyOS Computer Technology and Ecosystem Communication event in China. It is said to be based on the company’s HarmonyOS Next mobile OS which was announced in October 2024 and has been developed independently of Android. Huawei claims it has been rebuilt from the kernel with enhancements made to HarmonyOS Base, HarmonyOS Ecosystem, and HarmonyOS Experience. It can support up to 1,000 external peripherals.
title: Huawei Announces HarmonyOS 5 Operating System With AI Features for PCs

description: iQOO Neo 10 is set to arrive in the Indian market later this month. The company has announced the launch date and confirmed several key features of the phone, including chipset details. The phone will be equipped with a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC alongside an in-house Q1 gaming chip. It is expected to join the iQOO Neo 10R handset in India, which was unveiled in March.
title: iQOO Neo 10 India Launch Date Set For May 26; Confirmed to Get Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC

description: iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ is confirmed to launch in China soon. The Vivo sub-brand shared the first official teaser of the new Neo series phone on Thursday. The teaser reveals the design of the iQOO Neo 10 Pro+. It has a familiar design language with a dual rear camera unit. iQOO has not disclosed the launch date of the phone yet, but it has opened pre-orders for the iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ via its official online store in China.
title: iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ Confirmed to Debut This Month, Pre-Reservations Begin

description: Mistral Medium 3, a new artificial intelligence (AI) model, was released on Wednesday. The Paris-based AI firm introduced the enterprise-focused model with an emphasis on high performance at lower costs. It is claimed to be state-of-the-art (SOTA) in terms of performance in its class, and is said to be available at significantly lower costs compared to the competition.
title: Mistral Medium 3 Multimodal AI Model Released, Outperforms Llama 4 Maverick

description: OpenAI announced a new initiative on Wednesday aimed at helping countries outside of the US build artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure. Dubbed OpenAI for Countries, the initiative is part of the Stargate Project it announced in January. While Stargate Project is primarily focused on developing AI infrastructure in the US, the new initiative will help other countries in capacity development.
title: OpenAI for Countries Initiative to Build AI Infrastructure for More Countries Announced

description: Poco F7 has been in the rumour mill for a while, but now its official launch seems closer than ever. The F series Poco handset has been spotted on the US Federal Communications Commission (FCC), indicating that an official announcement might be around the corner. The Poco F7 is expected to run on the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC.
title: Poco F7 Allegedly Spotted on FCC Certification Site, Suggests Imminent Global Launch

description: Realme GT 7 series will be unveiled globally later this month. The company has announced the launch date of the lineup, which will include the base Realme GT 7 and Realme GT 7T handsets. The standard model was introduced in China in April with a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset and a 7,200mAh battery. The global variant will come with the same IceSense Graphene technology as its Chinese counterpart.
title: Realme GT 7, Realme GT 7T Global Launch Date Set for May 27; Availability Details Confirmed

description: Samsung Galaxy F56 5G has been launched in India. The new Galaxy F series smartphone has a slim build, and runs on the Exynos 1480 chipset paired with 8GB of RAM. It has a 6.7-inch display with 120Hz refresh rate and features a triple rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary sensor. Samsung is promising six years of Android upgrades for the new Galaxy F56 5G.
title: Samsung Galaxy F56 5G With 7.2mm Slim Design, Triple Rear Cameras Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 is expected to arrive this year as the successor to the Galaxy Watch 7. As per a report, the purported smartwatch could bring a new feature which tracks the antioxidant levels in your system. Dubbed Antioxidant Index, it may enable you to keep a check on the beta carotene levels with the Galaxy Watch 8 via the Samsung Health app. The measurement will reportedly be done non-intrusively, by placing the finger on the back of the watch.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Could Reportedly Debut With Antioxidant Index Feature

description: Sonos unveiled the Arc Ultra soundbar and Sub 4 subwoofer initially in the US in October 2024. Now, the company has introduced the audio products to India alongside the Sonos Era 100 Pro speaker. The Sub 4 is claimed to offer more dynamic bass performance, while the soundbar comes with Sound Motion technology and Dolby Atmos support, and a 9.1.4 system for a spatial audio experience. The Sonos Era 100 Pro speaker is optimised for Power over Ethernet+ (PoE+).
title: Sonos Launches Arc Ultra Soundbar, Sub 4 Subwoofer, and Era 100 Pro Speaker in India

description: The US Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) has clarified that all national banks and federal savings associations under its control are permitted to offer crypto services to their clients. These may include crypto-to-fiat conversions, trade executions, and tax services among others.
title: US Banks Permitted to Offer Crypto Custody and Management Services, OCC Confirms

description: WhatsApp recently announced that it was working on a secure "Private Processing" cloud technology for upcoming AI features. A feature tracker has now spotted a new feature that could utilise this system. The platform is also reportedly working on AI-generated chat wallpapers. Meanwhile, WhatsApp has begun testing a feature allowing users to add "prompts" to their status updates on both iOS and Android.
title: WhatsApp Message Summarisation, AI-Powered Chat Wallpapers Spotted in Development

description: Xiaomi has unveiled its QLED TV FX Pro series in India. The new smart TV lineup comes with a 4K QLED panel, built-in Fire TV and is offered in 43-inch or 55-inch size. The Xiaomi QLED TV FX Pro series runs on a quad-core A55 processor and includes 32GB of storage. The Xiaomi QLED TV FX Pro series was unveiled alongside the Xiaomi 4K TV FX series.
title: Xiaomi QLED TV FX Pro, Xiaomi 4K TV FX Series Smart TVs With In-Built Fire TV Launched in India

description: Google has rolled out the Gemini app for iPad globally, months after it debuted on iOS. It comes with the same capabilities the tech giant offers on Android and iOS versions, enabling users to generate images leveraging its multi-modal capabilities. Gemini also comes with the ability to find information across apps like Gmail and YouTube, and even accept image queries to solve problems. As per Google, the new Gemini app for iOS also brings its most notable feature — Gemini Live.
title: Google Launches Gemini App for iPad With Gemini Live, AI Image Creation Features

description: Starlink has been cleared by the Department of Telecom (DoT) to offer satcom services in India. Unlike conventional satellite services that rely on distant geostationary satellites, Starlink utilises the world's largest low Earth orbit or LEO constellation (550 km above Earth).
title: Elon Musk's Starlink Gets DoT Nod to Offer Satcom Services in India

description: FTC's legal challenge against Microsoft's $69 billion purchase of Call of Duty maker Activision Blizzard has been rejected by a US Court. A three-judge panel unanimously ruled that the lower judge had applied the correct legal standards and said the FTC had not shown it was likely to succeed on its claims that the merger would restrict competition.
title: Microsoft Wins Appeal in FTC Challenge to $69 Billion Activision Blizzard Deal

description: Apple told the San Francisco-based 9th US Circuit Court of Appeals in a filing on Wednesday that it will be irreparably harmed if the April 30 order is not put on hold while the iPhone maker’s legal challenge is pending.
title: Apple Asks US Appeals Court to Pause Ruling in Epic Games Case

description: Apple is reportedly considering bringing artificial intelligence (AI) search options to the Safari browser. As per the report, the information was shared by an Apple executive during a testimony in the ongoing antitrust case against the US Justice Department. The executive highlighted that the Cupertino-based tech giant had held discussions with several AI service providers recently to add their web search capabilities as a non-default option in its browser.
title: Apple Reportedly Considering AI-Powered Search Options for Safari Browser

description: Google has cut about 200 jobs across its global business unit. Big Tech players have been redirecting spending towards data centers and AI development, while scaling back investments in other areas.
title: Google Cuts About 200 Staff in Global Business Unit: Report

description: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge handset finally gets a launch date. The handset was initially announced at the Galaxy Unpacked event in January and later showcased in March at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2025 in Barcelona. The company has now confirmed its launch date and teased a few of its details. The upcoming Galaxy S25 Edge is touted to be the slimmest flagship phone.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Launch Date Set for May 13; Confirmed to Get 200-Megapixel Camera

description: Spotify on Wednesday announced several updates which aim to improve upon the existing listening and playlist curation experience. The Queue option, which appears at bottom of the  Now Playing view, is said to have received a design upgrade. Further, the redesign also brings easy access to controls like Smart Shuffle, Sleep Timer, and repeat. Spotify says listeners will now find Add, Sort, and other playlist management at the top of all playlists, enabling them to customise their track lists swiftly.
title: Spotify Rolls Out New Playlist Management Tools, Snooze for 30 Days and Other Features

description: Xbox games occupied the top three spots on the digital bestsellers’ list on the PS5 in April. These best-selling games include The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered from Bethesda and the PS5 port of Forza Horizon 5 from Playground Games, both of which launched in April.
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered and Forza Horizon 5 Are PS5's Top-Selling Games in April

description: Now streaming on Amazon Prime Video, Conclave (2024) is a critically acclaimed thriller exploring secrets inside the Vatican. With Ralph Fiennes in a standout role and Edward Berger at the helm, the film blends mystery, religion, and power struggles into a hauntingly relevant tale. Perfect for fans of political and spiritual drama.
title: Conclave (2024) Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know

description: Meta explored adding facial recognition to its smart glasses, allowing users to identify nearby individuals, according to a report. This opt-in feature raises privacy concerns, as people whose faces would be scanned wouldn't be offered a choice. While current Ray-Ban Meta glasses use an LED to indicate recording, it's unclear if facial recognition would have a similar indicator.
title: Meta Reportedly Considered Bringing Facial Recognition Support to Its Smart Glasses

description: Ouseppinte Osiyathu is an ultimate family drama movie that revolves around a family that suddenly faces an unexpected issue. When the secrets from the past are uncovered, the tension arises between the father and his sons. Will they be able to solve it? Watch this complete entertainer only on ManoramaMax, streaming from 9th May, 2025 onwards.
title: Ouseppinte Osiyathu OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Malayam Family Drama Online?

description: Prathi Niraparadhiyaano is a story of today's society that will move the viewers and make them question basics like the accused's guilt and how the justice system works with a strong character-driven plot and a strong cast. It challenges the very fact of how modern society views and discriminates between the guilty and the innocent.
title: Prathi Niraparadhiyaano OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Malayalam Drama Movie Online?

description: According to a report, One UI 8 will introduce Gemini Actions on not just the Samsung Galaxy Watch but other Wear OS-powered smartwatches too, which may be leveraged to get responses to general queries, summarise emails, and more. The automation and task management capabilities which Gemini supports on smartphones are said to come to smartwatches with Samsung's next iteration of its watch firmware.
title: Wear OS-Powered Smartwatches Could Reportedly Benefit from AI Query Responses, Other Gemini Actions

description: Apple is said to have seen a significant decline in the demand for its smartwatches in most regions. As per a market research firm, 2024 was the second consecutive year where Apple Watch shipments declined by a striking margin. One of the most notable areas where shipments fell is North America, the Cupertino-based tech giant’s home turf. This is attributed to the lack of new models, as well as minimal upgrades made to the existing lineup in the last year.
title: Apple Watch Shipments Fall for 2nd Consecutive Year Due to Lack of New Model, Minimal Upgrades: Report

description: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra will be introduced in India next week, the company has revealed. In addition to confirming the launch date, Motorola has teased the smartphone's colour options and key features. The clamshell foldable handset and the standard Motorola Razr 60 were also unveiled in the US in April. The upcoming Indian variant is expected to be similar to its global counterpart.
title: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra India Launch Set for May 13; Colour Options, Key Specifications Teased

description: Oppo Reno 14 series will go official in China next week. Oppo, via Weibo, has confirmed the arrival of the new Reno series smartphones in its home country. The Oppo Reno 14 series is expected to include the standard Oppo Reno 14 and Reno 14 Pro models. The handsets will be unveiled alongside the Oppo Pad SE tablet and Enco Clip wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Series, Oppo Pad SE to Debut on May 15; Design, Colour Options Teased

description: Whether you’re sketching designs in a lecture hall, compiling code on the go, or leading a virtual boardroom from your living room, this laptop keeps pace with your ambition.
title: Powering the Future: The Samsung Galaxy Book5 Pro 360 with Intel Lunar Lake

description: Powerbeats Pro 2 is a great TWS for fitness enthusiasts. It caters to one of the biggest challenges while exercising: the fit. The feature list is also pretty long and includes heart rate monitoring, so you do not have to depend on your smartwatch for the measuring. The battery life and sound quality are solid, too. The hook design is excellent for workouts, but it has a learning curve. Overall, the Powerbeats Pro 2 delivers on what it promises.
title: Powerbeats Pro 2 Review: The Fitness-Focused Buds
